title: Does 'philosophy' takes us away from reality, the world around us? - Quora

response.answer_text: Philosophy come into play when we face painful situation of life. We arrive at religious, spiritual and philosophical learnings when we suffer. And it is the final purpose of our life which shows path to salvation. Our wealth and relatives will not come with us at the end of the life is the highest of philosophy . A happy man will say then.. Let us enjoy till then.. But It increases our desire which lead us to increase negative karma. At the mean time , A man who undergo ups and down in life thinks that his purpose is to obtain salvation and quit re-birth… Now you have answer what is philosophy , How it works and how it helps us. ;)

It is said ‘Chinta, Chita hoti hai’ (Thinking is like a Fire). And Philosophy (Darshan) comes from Chintan (Thinking). If you do not think anything, you can not visualize anything and there will be no philosophy. It does not take you away from any reality but from our convenience, comforts and well being. It might take you to reality but the reality is the worst thing to face. Therefore nobody goes there and remains in its comfort zone presuming it as reality.

According to me, yes, it does. But it doesn't mean one should not read philosophy. I mean, anyone should do what they like or want to. No? The thing is if you read philosophy or politics, or whatever, you should not embrace it as reality. At last, knowledge is not reality. It does help you build ladder, though. Reality is what you see, hear, feel, conclude, enjoy or live. :) Best wishes.

Philosophy is not Fiction, which takes you away from reality.! It's a vision for the world, which is not being shared by all the people from the same world.! Understand the Difference, it's not a source of escapism but a view for a different world.!

No, Philosophy is subjective and is a concept of how you live your life. It is what you belief in! It makes your more close to the reality. Spirituality on the other hand is what takes you away from the reality.
No. It makes the world and living, bearable and romantic. It makes us see the pain and joy in our life, in a different light. Philosophy gives reason to rhyme and a rhyme to sing !
Yes it kind of deviates from reality
Philosophy is a way of thinking in life . It does not takes you away from reality. It helps to mend the reality to the way you think .
